Html:
Hi RadioMan,

    I am very thankful for this preciuos project.

 I have a small issue. When i am selecting the MapMode as  "SERVER AND CACHE",

the folder "TileDBv3" is creating in windows XP and working fine. BUT it is not creating in the Windows 2008.

Other folders like "GeocoderCache","RouteCache" are creating fine But db folder is not creating.

Here i am using the I.E. 64 bit.

It is working fine in windows XP.

Can you please suggest how to recifty this issue.

Thanx in advance.
to be able run sqlite in x64 system, you must use x64 dll, or set target to x86, so it works anywhere, check documentation

Hi RadioMan,

      Thanx for the reply..

I am using visual studio 2005.Can you please tell me where can i find x64 dll. 

Thanx in advance.

Hi RadioMan,

      Thanx for the reply..

I have some issue with it.

1. I have taken the System.Data.SQLite.DLL from x64 folder.

2.Kept the platform target as x86.

3.Kept the conditional sysmbols as "" MONOdisabled; MySQLdisabled;SQLiteEnabled ""

      Is there any wrong in this.

I am getting ERROR as Cannot load gmap.core dll.

Thanx in advance.

1. I have taken the System.Data.SQLite.DLL from x64 folder.

2.Kept the platform target as x86.

Can i ask you why? ;}

I followed the steps in the documnetations.

  • change references
  • set target to x86 so it works anywhere

    • Is there any thing wrong?

exactly, but it;s not 1.2.3, but separate options * * * ;}

so you (can change references) or (set target to x86)

ohh.. Thanx a lot for the information.;}

Is there any change in the conditional sysmbols when i change reference (using x64 dll).

Currently i am using

MONOdisabled; MySQLdisabled;SQLiteEnabled
conditional sysmbols are the same, but is you use x64 sqlite, you must set target to x64, thats all ;}

Hi RadioMan,

    If i use x64 sql lite, it is giving me error as

""Could not load file or assembly 'System.Data.SQLite, Version=1.0.65.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=db937bc2d44ff139' or one of its dependencies. An attempt was made to load a program with an incorrect format.""

Conditional symbols are :- MONOdisabled; MySQLdisabled;SQLiteEnabled

Can you please help me, how to overcome this issue.

Thanx a lot in advance.
